attributes.action: let Parliament conduct its business using internet video conferencing, so MPs can stay at home, and have no need to commute or to reside in any second home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have the technology. The Speaker can moderate and make sure only the current orator is heard, and interjections are silenced. There are some circumstances where it may be necessary to physically attend, such as the Queen's Speech, or the Finance Bill, or closed sessions, times of emergency etc. But for the most part, the House can meet on line and the public can still see it.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
